name: Format
description:
Consider:
  • Face-to-face - all teaching sessions are provided on-site
  • Online - all teaching sessions are provided online
  • Hybrid - teaching sessions are provided simultaneously on-site and online
  • Blended - teaching sessions are provided either on-site or online

name: Scheduling
description:
Consider:
  • Scheduled - participants are required to attend at a specific time
  • Unscheduled - participants can attend at their own pace
